DOC.brief_summary: Randomized controlled trial compare two technique laparoscopic sleeve gastrectomy treatment morbid obesity . In first technique investigator start dissection gastrocolic ligament 6 cm pylorus second one distance 2 cm . The main primary outcome measure weight loss .
DOC.brief_title: Two Six cm From Pylorus Laparoscopic Sleeve Gastrectomy
DOC.criteria: morbid obesity body mass index 40 35 least one comorbidity extreme age less 18 65 year contraindication laparoscopy
